model.name: Deterministic User UUID
model.title: Deterministic User UUID
model.description: User UUIDs must be deterministic based on username to ensure consistent identification. The same username must always generate the same UUID using SHA-256 hashing of 'user:username' formatted as a valid UUID v4. For example, user 'donges' must always have UUID 7e65139d-38cf-4f34-b769-0a86dd3a94e3
